DataElement.preferredName: Protocol Agent Transfer Administration, Management Performed Study Activity Dose Day Number PCORnet CDM Prescription Supply Day Count
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A medical product, practice, or application that is tested in a clinical trial._The act of conveying or transporting from one place to another._Performing or possessing executive duties; acting as a supervisor or manager._Executed and carried through to completion._A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it._An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions._A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time._The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day._A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification._Number of days supply ordered, as specified by the prescription.

This also refers to a specific day._A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Protocol Agent Transfer Administration Performed Study Activity
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A medical product, practice, or application that is tested in a clinical trial.:The act of conveying or transporting from one place to another.:Performing or possessing executive duties; acting as a supervisor or manager.:Executed and carried through to completion.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective.

Concepts.definition: A medical product, practice, or application that is tested in a clinical trial.
The act of conveying or transporting from one place to another.
Performing or possessing executive duties; acting as a supervisor or manager.
Executed and carried through to completion.
A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.
An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions.

Property.preferredDefinition: A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.:The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.:A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

Concepts.definition: A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.
The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.
A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: To determine the number or amount of something; the result of this activity.
